devdoc.details: The rewards are transferred to the pool by calling `fundPool`.      Only the reward supplier can notify.

fundPool(uint256).details: Should be called by external mechanism

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A reward pool that does not mint

earned(address).notice: Calculate the earned rewards for an account

fundPool(uint256).notice: Transfers reward amount to pool and updates reward rate

getReward().notice: Claims reward for the sender account

rewardForDuration().notice: Total rewards to distribute for the duration

unstake(uint256).notice: Withdraw specified amount and collect rewards
